turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Thangam Debbonaire.
turn.1: What is the political background of Thangam Debbonaire?
turn.2: Debbonaire was reelected in the 2017 general election with an increased majority of 37,336 votes; this was the fourth largest majority by vote size nationally.
turn.3: What is the political affiliation of Thangam Debbonaire?
turn.4: Bristol West had been the number one target for the Green Party, which slipped to third place behind the Conservatives with a 12.9% vote share.
turn.5: Is there anything else noteworthy about the political background of Thangam Debbonaire?
turn.6: Debbonaire had resisted calls from the Green Party for her to stand aside as part of a progressive alliance.
turn.8: The size of Debbonaire's majority was considered a shock, as the seat had been billed as a four-way marginal.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: On 15 September 2017, Debbonaire held what is thought to be the UK's first constituency surgery specifically for people on the autism spectrum.
turn.11: What did she do at the surgery?
turn.12: In the same month, she urged local constituency members that had not forgiven her for her resignation to stop working against her and threatening her with deselection, which she claimed was "a catastrophic waste of time".
